info.name: Rooms API
info.description: An API for an integrator to access the features of DocuSign Rooms

item.name: Accounts
Get information about the account.

request.description: Returns details about a company account.

item.name: Documents
Get information about the Document with the given DocumentId.

request.description: Returns information about a document in a room. You can optionally request the contents of the document, which is returned in base64-encoded format.\n\nTo find the `documentId` of the document that you want to retrieve, use the Rooms::GetDocuments method.

item.name: Deletes a document.

request.description: Permanently deletes a document. To find the `documentId` of a document that you want to delete, use the Rooms::GetDocuments method.\n\nIf the document is deleted successfully, the HTTP response code is 204 (No Content), so the response body is empty.

item.name: Grants access to a document for a user.

request.description: Grants a user access to a document. You specify the user's `userId` in the request body. The response is an object that specifies the access the user has.

item.name: ESignPermissionProfiles
Gets permission profiles from the associated eSign account.

request.description: When you create or invite a new member in Rooms, the system creates an eSignature account for the member at the same time. This method returns a list of the eSignature permission profiles that the current user may be able to assign to a new member. The current user may not assign a permission higher than their own permission.

item.name: Forms
Creates an external form fill session.

request.description:
Returns a URL for a new external form fill session, based on the `roomId` and `formId` or `formIds` that you specify in the `formFillSessionForCreate` request body.
User may supply up to 10 `formIds`. Eventually, `formId` will be deprecated.

item.name: Get account Form Groups.

request.description: Returns the company form groups to which the current user has access.

item.name: Creates a form group.

request.description: Creates a new form group with the name given in the `name` property of the request body.

item.name: Gets a form group.

request.description: Get the specified form group.

item.name: Renames a form group.

request.description: Renames the specified form group with the name given in the `name` property of the request.

item.name: Deletes a form group.

request.description: Deletes the specified form group.

item.name: Gets the user's form group's forms.

request.description: Get forms of the specified form group.

item.name: Removes a form from a form group.

request.description: Removes the form `formId` from the form group `formGroupId`.

item.name: Assigns a form to a form group.

request.description: Assigns the form specified in the `formId` property of the request to the form group `formGroupId`.

item.name: Assign office to a form group so the specified office has access to the form group.

request.description: "Grants the office `officeId` access to the form group `formGroupId`.

item.name: Remove office to a form group so the specified office doesn't have access to the form group.

request.description: Revoke access to the form group `formGroupId` from the office `officeId`.

item.name: Gets a paged list of forms libraries.

request.description: Returns a list of form libraries to which the current user has access.

item.name: Gets a paged list of forms in a forms library.

request.description: Returns a list of forms  to which the current user has access in the specified form library.

item.name: Retrieves all Associations by provider

request.description: Retrieves all Associations for given provider

item.name: Gets form based on Id.

request.description: Returns details about a specific form, such as the date it was created and last updated, the number of pages, the form owner, and other information.

item.name: Fields
Get details of a specific field set.

request.description: Get details of a specific field set.

item.name: GlobalResources
Retrieves the list of valid countries.

request.description: Returns a list of countries that the API supports

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid closing statuses.

request.description: Returns a list of closing statuses, or valid reasons for closing a room.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid contact sides.

request.description: Returns a list of valid contact sides.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid financing types.

request.description: Returns a list of possible financing types

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid origins of leads.

request.description: Returns a list of origins of leads (such as Trulia or Zillow) that you can specify for rooms.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid property types.

request.description: Returns a list of property types.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid room contact types.

request.description: Returns a list of room contact types, such as Buyer, Seller, and Listing Agent.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid seller decision types.

request.description: Returns a list of valid seller decision types.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid special circumstance types.

request.description: Returns a list of special circumstance types

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid task date types.

request.description: Returns a list of date types that you can use with tasks, such as `Actual Close Date` and `Task Due Date`

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid task responsibility types.

request.description: Returns a list of responsibility types that you can assign to users when you add them to a task.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid task statuses.

request.description: Returns a list of valid task statuses.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid transaction sides.

request.description: Returns a list of valid transaction sides.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid states.

request.description: Returns a list of states.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid currencies.

request.description: Returns a list of valid values for the currencies that you can use for listing, offer, and loan amounts.

item.name: Retrieves the list of valid time zones.

request.description: Gets a list of time zones that you can assign to an office.

item.name: Offices
Get all offices.

request.description: This method returns a list of offices associated with an account.

item.name: Create an office.

request.description: Create an office.

item.name: Get information about the office with the given officeId.

request.description: Get information about the office with the given officeId.

item.name: Delete an office.

request.description: This method deletes an office from a Rooms account.

item.name: Lists the number of objects of each type that reference the office.

request.description: This method returns a list of each type of object and the number of objects of that type referencing the specified office. Note that an office cannot be deleted while existing objects reference it.

item.name: Regions
Get account regions.

request.description: Returns a list of regions that are associated with a Rooms account.

item.name: Creates a new region for a company

request.description: Creates a new region for a company

item.name: Get information about the region with the given regionId

request.description: Get information about the region with the given regionId

item.name: Delete a region.

request.description: Delete a region.

item.name: Get region reference counts.

request.description: This method returns a list of each type of object and the number of objects of that type referencing the specified region.

item.name: Roles
Gets a paged-list of roles in your company

request.description: Returns a list of roles associated with a company account

item.name: Creates a role.

request.description: Creates a new company role in Rooms

item.name: Get information about the role with the given roleId.

request.description: Get information about the role with the given roleId.

item.name: Updates the role with the given roleId.

request.description: Updates the role with the given roleId.

item.name: Deletes the role with the given roleId.

request.description: Deletes a role from a company account in Rooms

item.name: Rooms
Creates an envelope with given documents. Returns the eSign envelope ID created

request.description: Creates an envelope with given documents. Returns the eSign envelope ID created

item.name: Returns the FieldData associated with the provided roomId.

request.description: Returns the field data associated with a room. This is the information that appears on the room's **Details** tab.

item.name: Updates room field data.

request.description: Updates room field data.

item.name: Gets room folders accessible to the calling user.

request.description: Gets a list of room folders in the specified room that are accessible to the current user.

item.name: Adds a DocuSign Form to a room

request.description: Adds a form to a room.

item.name: Retrieves the list of users in the given room.

request.description: This method returns a list of users associated with a room.

item.name: Invites a user to the room by email address.

request.description: This method invites an existing or new member to a specific room.

item.name: Updates the specified user's role and transaction side.

request.description: Updates the specified user's role and transaction side.

item.name: Revokes the specified user's access to the room.

request.description: Revokes the specified user's access to the room.

item.name: Restores the specified user's access to the room.

request.description: Restores the specified user's access to the room.

item.name: Gets rooms available to the calling user.

request.description: Gets rooms available to the calling user

item.name: Creates a new Room

request.description: Creates a new Room

item.name: Gets information about the given room.

request.description: Returns details about the given room

item.name: Deletes the room having the given room ID.

request.description: Deletes the room having the given room ID.

item.name: Returns the roles for which the calling user, based on their role within the room, can assign to invitees.

request.description: This method returns the room-level roles that the current user can assign to the members that they invite to a room.

item.name: Get documents in the room accessible to the calling user.

request.description: This method returns a list of documents that the current user can access for a specific room.

item.name: Add a document to a room.

request.description: Add a document to a room

item.name: Add a document to a room via file contents upload.

request.description: This method uploads the contents of file as a room document for the room that you specify.

item.name: Update the picture for a room.

request.description: This endpoint supports the following content types, application/json as JSON PictureForUpdate{"fileName":"string", "Base64Contents":"string"}, multipart/formdata and any other streamed binary content type (as long as either query parameter fileName or request header ContentDisposition filename is included).

item.name: Gets the field set associated with the room.

request.description: Returns the field set that a room uses.

item.name: TaskLists
Returns the summary for all viewable task lists in a room.

request.description: Returns the task lists associated with a room.

item.name: Add a task list to a room based on a task list template.

request.description: Applies a task list to a room, based on the `taskTemplateId` that you specify in the `taskList` request body.

item.name: Deletes a task list. If there are attached documents they will remain in the associated room.

request.description: Deletes the specified task list from a room. If there are attached documents, they will remain in the associated room.

item.name: Returns all task list templates for the company of the active user.

request.description: Returns all task list templates for the company of the active user.

item.name: RoomTemplates
Returns all room templates that the active user has access to

request.description: This method returns a list of room templates that the user can use to create a new room. The response includes company and region-level templates

item.name: Users
Gets a paged-list of users.

request.description: Retrieves a paged-list of Company Users in the User's company using the given filter and sort parameters.

item.name: Retrieves user information for the user having the given UserId.

request.description: Retrieves user information for the user having the given UserId.

item.name: Updates user information

request.description: Updates user information

item.name: Removes a user from the company.

request.description:
Removes the user. Will fail if the user owns any Rooms. 
The rooms will need to be transferred to other agents before removing.

item.name: NON-CLASSIC COMPANY ONLY. Send an invitation to the user or non-user having the given email.

request.description: Invites a new user to join a company account on Rooms Version 6.

item.name: Reinvites the pending user with the given userId.

request.description: Reinvites an unactivated user to join a company account. You can use this method with either Rooms Version 5 or Rooms Version 6.

item.name: Adds the user to the designated office.

request.description: Adds the user to the designated office.

item.name: Removes the user from the designated office.

request.description: Removes the user from the designated office.

item.name: Adds the user to the designated region.

request.description: Adds the user to the designated region.

item.name: Removes the user from the designated region.

request.description: Removes the user from the designated region.

item.name: Locks the account of the user.

request.description: Locks the account of the user.

item.name: Unlocks the account of the user.

request.description: Unlocks the account of the user.

item.name: Authentication
01 Authorize Code Grant Access Token
02 JWT Access Token
03 Refresh Access Token
04 Get User Info
